column4: I'm trying to run Hoary from Live-CD on a vintage machine. Specs are: Intel Pentium Pro 200Mhz, 128MB EDO, LG CD-RW Drive. I get the following error message: ISOLINUX 2.04 2003-04-16 isolinux: Loading spec packet failed trying to wing it... isolinux: Failed to locate CD-ROM device; boot failed.
